longBusinessSummary: We are SYN, and we have a deep understanding of the Brazilian commercial real estate market. Our business is to make our clients' lives easier so they can focus on their own businesses. We serve various market segments, including shopping malls, commercial buildings, and warehouses. Our services encompass leasing, management, as well as buying and selling commercial properties. Our team consists of experts in management, projects, engineering, security, technology, and business, with experience, autonomy, and a lot of talent for innovation to deliver the best solutions. Every day, we wake up and dedicate ourselves to ensuring that companies and retailers feel at ease, achieve their goals, and thrive. We work behind the scenes, taking care of people's experiences in SYN spaces while they work, shop, and have fun.
